doc:
Earl Nightingale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earl_Nightingale 0 Earl Nightingale (March 12, 1921 – March 25, 1989) was an American radio speaker and author, dealing mostly with the subjects of human character development, motivation, and meaningful existence. He was the voice during the early 1950s of Sky King, the hero of a radio adventure series, and was a WGN radio program host from 1950 to 1956. Nightingale was the author of The Strangest Secret, which economist Terry Savage has termed “…one of the great motivational books of all time“. Earl_Nightingale ( March_12_,_1921 – March_25_,_1989 ) was an_American_radio_speaker_and_author , dealing mostly with the_subjects of human_character_development , motivation , and meaningful_existence . He was the_voice during the_early_1950s of Sky_King , the_hero of a_radio_adventure_series , and was a_WGN_radio_program_host from 1950 to 1956 . Nightingale was the_author of The_Strangest_Secret , which economist_Terry_Savage has_termed “ … one of the_great_motivational_books of all_time “ .
